description: Made with recycled polyester Tencel™ Lyocell, their new active knits offer an unrivaled comfort, breathability and durability. Made in partnership with their Fair Trade Certififed™ manufacturers, you can also feel good knowing that you’re supporting ethical practices while perfecting your own practice or training pursuits.
